explains: n. 靛蓝色；木蓝属植物；靛蓝染料
adj. （介于深蓝色和紫色之间）靛蓝色的
wordGroup: indigo blue n. [化]靛蓝；紫蓝色

sentences.en: The blue dye is obtained from the indigo plant.
sentences.cn: 蓝色染料是从靛蓝植物中提取的。

sentences.en: The blue vat dye obtained until about 1900 entirely from some species of the indigo plant.
sentences.cn: 直到大约1900年，蓝色还原染料都是从靛蓝植物中提取的。

sentences.en: The indigo plant was highly valued until the discovery of chemical dyes in the 19th century.
sentences.cn: 在19世纪发现化学染料之前，靛蓝一直被高度重视。
